HERO.H1: I'm Diego, I design and build high-performance websites and SaaS products that combine thoughtful design with solid development.

ABOUTSECTION.CONTENT:
I trained as a graphic designer, studying the relationship between form and function. Over time, I realized the designs I imagined needed code to come alive. That curiosity led me to web development, and what started as a tool to bring my designs to life became a second calling.

Today I work as a full-stack developer and product designer, combining 10+ years of experience in both disciplines. I understand design from the inside and translate it into clean, efficient code. That intersection is my greatest strength: creating products that not only look good, but work exceptionally well.

I specialize in two areas: high-performance websites that combine polished visual design with technical speed, and SaaS products like dashboards, applications, and internal tools that make people's work easier. I use modern web technologies and pay special attention to accessibility, making sure what I build is usable for everyone.
